ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "M3+"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Stage__c), "M3+")), NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Stage__c),"M1"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Stage__c),"M2"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Stage__c),"M3"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Stage__c),"M3++") ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invalid transition to M3+. Allowed previous: M1, M2, M3, M3++.
